message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm very interested but $15000 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm happy to pay $10000 for it, would you be willing to consider that?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $12500. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm confident you'll find it a fair price for this exceptional product.
